---
title: "R Markdown pdf 中文报告模板"
author: ""
date: "`r Sys.Date()`"
geometry: margin=1.18in
fontsize: 12pt
linestretch: 1.5
links-as-notes: yes
lof: true
lot: true
documentclass: ctexart
output:
  rticles::ctex:
    fig_caption: yes
    number_sections: yes
    toc: yes
    toc_depth: 3
  bookdown::html_document2:
    toc: true
    toc_float: true
    includes:
      before_body: header.html
      after_body: footer.html
    highlightstyle: github
bibliography: references.bib
biblio-style: "apalike"
link-citations: true
colorlinks: yes
#nocite: '@*'
classoption: "a4paper,oneside,"
---
